评论概述: Mens Long Sleeve Wrinkle Free Shirt
评论详情: This is a great shirt. It's very well made. The material appears to be pretty good quality. It went through the wash just fine(I did air dry). Another winner from Coofandy. This is a beautiful shirt that is comfortable to wear. The sizing is right, as always. I have never been disappointed with an item from this company. Always a good value.

This is a nice shirt and it did come out of the dryer with no wrinkles which is great.  The one thing I didn’t like was the weight of the shirt as it is very heavy.  I know liking or disliking the weight is personal preference and it will also have something to do with the climate you live in.  I live in Phoenix Arizona so there aren’t a lot of days I would like to wear a shirt that heavy.  Having said that, it is a nice looking shirt and wrinkle free.

I was surprised at the thickness of this shirt, as I expected it to be a very thin material. This one is on the thick side, so it would be great for colder weather. The fabric is still on the softer side and has stretch, so it is comfortable to wear. It looks nice on my hubby and fits him well. It also came through the wash well.
This dress shirt came very wrinkly and creased and was a little annoying to iron out. Other than that, the shirt is comfortable and nice to wear.
This button down ‘polo’ type shirt is perfect. A bit heavier than I expected, but looked amazing, and very upscale when my husband put on!

评论概述: Order your regular size not what is on the size chart
评论详情: I ordered according to the size chart and it is too small. I should have ordered the regular size of Large instead of medium. Nice fabric and seems to be good quality. I'll return and reorder in correct size.

This is a nice shirt, the stretch fabric adds comfort and flexibility, allowing for easier movement. This makes the shirt more comfortable to wear, whether you’re at work or engaging in casual activities.  The button-down style provides a classic look that can be dressed up or down. It’s versatile enough for casual outings or more polished, professional settings.  The shirt includes a pocket, which adds functionality for carrying small items like pens or business cards. It’s a practical feature for both work and everyday use.

评论概述: Thicker Material, Satiny Finish Makes This A Great Date Night Shirt
评论详情: This COOFANDY button-down dress shirt is really well made. The material is heavier than a regular dress shirt, but it still breathes well so my husband does not complain about getting overheated while wearing it. The shirt has a bit of a satiny sheen to it, which makes me think it should be worn more as a real dress shirt (like after 5:00) and not just to the office. I ordered the olive green, so other colors may not have such an obvious finish. But I think it would look a little out of place in a business meeting, unless the meeting was being held over a steak dinner. The shirt itself runs true to size and is soft and comfortable. I washed it in cold water and dried it on low and it is indeed wrinkle free. It's a nice shirt, it just doesn't strike me as an everyday shirt.

I was not expecting this shirt to be as incredibly soft as it is.  Its amazing.  Soft, stretchy, looks amazing, fits incredible.  I'm absolutely loving it!  I've gotten several Coofandy articles of clothing and have yet to be disappointed!

The COOFANDY Mens Long Sleeve Wrinkle Free Shirts Casual Button Down Stretch Dress Shirt with Pocket is a nice heavy thick material that will be very nice to wear as the weather cools down. It feels very nice on my skin and I'm very impressed with this shirt.

This shirt feels great. It a casual shirt but can be worn business casual as well. This shirt is wrinkle free and I have tested it as I have worn this shirt and already washed/ dried it. its classic design make this shirt versatile in how you would like to wear and to which occasion.

This shirt is very comfortable and fits well. We got an xxl for my partner and the fit is true to size. The fabric is soft and, I dare say, seems to repel pet hair well.  My partner really liked it and asked me to get a couple more. There’s some scratch to the fabric, which is great and, best of all, the fabric is wrinkle free, which my partner loves because he hates to iron his clothes.  Overall, awesome!

The quality of this shirt is far greater than I expected. It's a slightly thick, non-flimsy grade polyester/spandex mix.  It is soft, flexible, and my husband says it is comfortable. The tailoring is consistent. The color is vibrant and true. The fit is just as we expected. For reference, my husband is 6'3", 219 lbs and the XXL fits perfect. The only reason I rated it a four-star is because it is advertised as being wrinkle free, however, I cannot attest to that because it arrived full of wrinkles and required ironing. Aside from that, definitely worth purchasing.

Comfortable, fits well, good value. See photo. I am 6’1” 200 lb and wear a large. I ordered a large in this shirt and it fits appropriately (this photo was taken after it was washed and shrank a tad).

评论概述: Men's Long Sleeve Shirts are designed to be wrinkle-free.
评论详情: The COOFANDY Men's Long Sleeve Shirts are designed to be wrinkle-free, making them an excellent choice for those seeking a casual yet polished look. Featuring a button-down style and a convenient pocket, these stretch dress shirts offer both comfort and versatility, making them ideal for layering. The soft fabric enhances the overall wearing experience, ensuring that you not only look good but also feel great throughout the day.

The material of the shirt is soft and stretchy, and fits comfortably. It is on the thicker side, but perfect for Spring/Fall. It also dries fairly quickly and you can't see if you're wearing an undershirt. Very good casual button up.

I opted for the color 'Green' and the color looks really nice, a great dark shade of green. The material feels soft, and silky -- overall very comfortable. As a male 5'8 and 150 lbs, the medium fits snug enough to comfortably wear a tshirt underneath. I also have the same exact shirt in short sleeve form, my ladyfriend loved the look on me and I loved the feel and color so I figured having a winter version around or one for colder days wouldn't hurt.  Coofandy has some nice, comfortable men's clothing.

This COOFANDY Mens Long Sleeve Wrinkle Free Shirts seems more like a woman's shirt. It is heavy weighted which I did not expect. Not something I can wear at all most of the time since my state runs warm to hot. It would be nice if you live in cold weather. It can get fold lines not sure about wrinkles. It looks nice but overall not something I plan to wear often.

评论概述: Nice shirt for guys with broad shoulders
评论详情: I have a well developed upper body and usually purchase large shirts to accommodate my shoulders and back. This shirt has a bit of stretch to it which makes it perfect for guys that need a bit more room. I also like the clean hem line on the bottom. Looks great just hanging loose. I got the large size and it fit me perfectly.

This is one heavy shirt! The fabric is soft and has some stretch to it. The construction of it is excellent. No loose threads or anything like that were found upon inspection. I ordered the shirt in a medium and the fit is true to size. It will definitely provide warmth, that's for sure. It will be comfortable to wear in cooler temps.

Ordering clothes on line is always a headache. This shirt is much heavier than I expected it to be but there was no way of knowing that when looking at the description. It's a warm heavy shirt (not a shirt jacket, just a heavy shirt) It's soft and comfortable. The sleeves are just a touch short for my arms but everyone is going to be a bit different. I'm 6' 210lb and got an Xl for it to be loose, it's not as big as I expected it to be so it fits on me fine. It's not Wrinkle free as it came wrinkled in the packaging. Maybe it'll loosen up and be better after a few washes.

评论概述: My wife liked it. Me... not so much
评论详情: The moment I received this shirt, I wanted to toss it out of the window. I really did not like the way it is manufactured. It reminds me of those shirts people used to wear in Vegas in the '70s that you can even see in some Columbo movies. I just cannot get past this. HOWEVER, I tried it on and my wife told me I really look good in it, so I am sold. No, I do not look like Columbo, and I usually do look good in button-down shirts, which may play to my advantage. There are also some very nice things about this shirt. First, it arrived vacuum packed and upon unpacking it, I see very little wrinkling, so the manufacturer is definitely truthful about this. Besides the '70s impression, the manufacturing quality is very good. I am sure this shirt is going to last. The material is very, very thick. And I mean thick! I would not wear this in summer, but it will be very comfortable for the fall/winter season. Be aware that the white (this is the color I picked) is not 100% bright. Even under strong light it appears ever so slightly off-white. Finally, I would not pair this with a suit, but I recommended for occasion when the dress code is casual as the collar is not rigid enough for a tie and the fit is quite relaxed. I would say that this is ideal for a work barbeque gathering on a fall evening.
Nice thick well made fall shirt.  Fits true to size.

I ordered this shirt because I wanted a long-sleeved shirt for winter wearing at work.  This shirt definitely fits the bill.  It is very well made, and because it's made of a really heavy material, it's especially good for winter wear.  You can wear it tucked in with slacks or leave it out with jeans.  Either way, the shirt looks nice and there are various colors to choose from.  The only negative I have is with the price--it seems a little steep to me.

Always on the lookout for a nice button down for either work or casual wear, and this COOFANDY definitely fits the bill. Shirt sizes can vary wildly from manufacturer to manufacturer; I normally wear a 15-16 neck, 32/33 sleeve in a dress shirt so I opted for medium as I don't mind being a little over-sized for casual wear. The medium turned out to be just right, sits well on the shoulders and not too long in the sleeves. The color I chose was olive green; I would almost call this a slate green because of the dark undertones; but since pictures speak louder, I've included a picture of the shirt with a color-checker so if you have Lightroom or equivalent, you can color correct for your monitor and get a good sense of the color. Either way, I really like the color, and think it pairs well with jeans or slacks equally.  Out of the shrink wrap package, it has a few folds as expected, but after a wash I'm sure the wrinkle free-ness (is that a word?) will shine due to the material: 65% poly, 30% viscose, and 5% spandex. For all man-made material, the shirt is very soft, and the spandex gives it a little bit of stretch. I also like that the cut is such that you can wear it untucked and not look sloppy. I'm looking forward to the cooler months so I can put this shirt into my regular rotation.  Pros: soft material, great casual look/can be worn untucked, wrinkle-free, great color Cons: none noted Rating: 5 of 5

I have to say that this is the heaviest shirt, I have ever worn in my life (by a margin). This is not a bad thing since it shows build quality. I am a large man and 2xl is what I normally wear. Since this is a bit stretchy, if you are, like me, preferring some relax fit options, you need to go for a size up or it will show your belly. Other than that, no complaints about the comfort and quality. It would look better on a more athletic person. Recommended for a stylish cozy less formal wear
